class.name: ColorRect
class.brief_description: A control that displays a solid color rectangle.
class.description: Displays a rectangle filled with a solid [member color]. If you need to display the border alone, consider using a [Panel] instead. Note that [ColorRect] inherits the property [member Control.mouse_filter] from [Control] and its default value is set to [constant Control.MOUSE_FILTER_STOP]. This causes input events to be marked as handled and therefore are blocked for all other nodes/objects in the tree. If you don't want this, set [member Control.mouse_filter] to [constant Control.MOUSE_FILTER_IGNORE] or [constant Control.MOUSE_FILTER_PASS].

members.member: The fill color of the rectangle.
